items.title: Leeds avoid upset with second-half comeback against Derby
items.description: James Justin scored his first goal for Leeds United since joining from Leicester City in the summer, in a second-half comeback after Derby County took...

items.title: Trump won't take Greenland by force, Mandelson says
items.description: The former UK ambassador to the US tells the BBC the president's advisers would likely warn him against the move.

items.title: Tories would ban under-16s from social media
items.description: Kemi Badenoch has promised to follow the example of Australia, which became the first country to introduce the policy last month.

items.title: Iran warns it will retaliate if US attacks as protesters defy crackdown
items.description: Medics at two hospitals tell the BBC more than 100 bodies have been brought in over a two day period.

items.title: Cold snap set to ease ahead of wet and windy week
items.description: Milder conditions are expected after days of snow, ice and strong winds.
